title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 328.8 - General
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 328.8 - General

State Regulations

The listing of a chemical as an authorized chemical, or any
authorization for its use, in or pursuant to this Part does not imply that it
is recommended by the Department of Environmental Conservation for controlling
or exterminating undesirable fish. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
328.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
